Sentence.value: Many people with COPD do not need to use a nebulizer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Many [[people|C0027361]] with [[COPD|C0024117]] do not need to use a [[nebulizer|C0027524]].

Sentence.value: Some people use a nose clip to help them breathe only through their mouth.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Some [[people|C0027361]] use a [[nose clip|C0179986]] to help them breathe only through their mouth.

Sentence.value: You'll need to clean your nebulizer to prevent bacteria from growing in it, which can cause a lung infection.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You'll need to clean your nebulizer to prevent [[bacteria|C0004611]] from growing in it, which can cause a [[lung infection|C0876973]].

Sentence.value: Call your doctor if you are having trouble using your nebulizer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Call your [[doctor|C0031831]] if you are having trouble using your [[nebulizer|C0027524]].
